    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              int id,
              PlayerColor color)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - is a string with the name chosen by the player is also the login identifier
        id - is a numeric identifier that also represents the place in the turn
        color - is the color of the character chosen by the player
